I

initializeFirstCellAndBoardGame() - Method in class game.Game
This method : Set the character position the first cell Character.setCharacterPosition(int) Retrieve the object BoardGame BoardGame.getBoardGame() Call the cellContent method with the level desired (Easy, Medium, Hard) to populate the Cell ArrayList with Enemies and Stuffs BoardGame.cellContent(String) Finally, the boardGame is shuffled to get random loots on the map
interaction(Character) - Method in class game.boardGame.cell.attackEquipment.AttackEquipment
Set the interaction method to allow children to use it
interaction(Character) - Method in class game.boardGame.cell.attackEquipment.spell.Spell
This method set all actions between the item and the character It has 3 main features : - Equip a spell (Thunderbolt or FireBall) - Equip a spell only if damage > currentSpell - Choose between 2 weapons with the same Damage - Equip the spell only for Wizard
interaction(Character) - Method in class game.boardGame.cell.attackEquipment.weapon.Weapon
This method set all actions between the item and the character It has 3 main features : - Equip a Weapon (Thunderbolt or FireBall) - Equip a Weapon only if damage > currentSpell - Choose between 2 weapons with the same Damage - Equip the spell only for Warrior
interaction(Character) - Method in class game.boardGame.cell.Cell
Abstract method to interact with the Cells
interaction(Character) - Method in class game.boardGame.cell.chest.healthCell.HealthCell
This method set all actions between the item and the character It regenerate the life to character
interaction(Character) - Method in class game.boardGame.cell.chest.surpriseCell.SurpriseCell
 
interaction(Character) - Method in class game.boardGame.cell.emptyCell.EmptyCell
This method will only display messages to the user, to indicate an empty cell
interaction(Character) - Method in class game.boardGame.cell.enemyCell.EnemyCell
Interaction between Enemy and Character Features : - Attack enemy without weapon - Attack enemy with a weapon or spell
isEmptyCell() - Method in class game.boardGame.cell.emptyCell.EmptyCell
